data.title: List of Tamil films of 2001
data.text:

Other releases

The following films also released in 2001, though the release date remains unknown.[1]

Title Director Cast Studio Ref Maname Mayangathe Shapeer Kumar Padmaja, Hema, Meenu Welcome Films [72] Theerpugal Maatrapadalaam M. K. Arunthavaraj Babu Ganesh, Vichithra Aum Devalayaa Cine Creations
